column4: I have two sound tabs, TriTech TR28602 (OSS Mixer), and Soundblaster Live! (Alsa Mixer).  The bass/treble settings are not having any effect on my sound.  And i don't think I have two soundcards.  What could be causing this?
gmail, I was on windows until today
it's normal, the oss (tritech) mixer is linked to the Audigy (alsa) mixer for compatibility with older apps
